messages.text:
Deleting
```julia-cli-release julia-cli-debug: julia-cli-% :
	@$(MAKE) $(QUIET_MAKE) -C $(BUILDROOT)/cli $*```
Allows the build to go through a bit longer

messages.text: Mine errors the same way
The result of doing `echo override XC_HOST = x86_64-w64-mingw32 >> Make.user`.
The most reliable way is to use Cygwin
